Text: EMCA For Sale vanity lights mini blindsSnazzy vanity lights These are chrome with beveledmirror fronts They would fit either a contempory or a classy decorating scheme Perfect condition with bulbs included each with bulbs included Tanlight brown mini blinds width long enough to cover your window Julie Young Stanford To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA Call for newsletter articlesHi guys Its nearing that time again Im getting ready to put together the EMCA newsletter so if theres anything youd like put in there please let me know Anything almost goes restaurant reviews new business notices interesting people lost pets for sales etc Ill need it by the second week of March Please remember that everything ends up being edited for content and length Theres so much going on around here that its hard to squeexe everything into the newsletter Put it in my mailslot leave a message on my machine up to minutes or email me Julie Young Stanford Yahoo Groups Sponsor Buy Stock for No Minimums FREE Money BgmYkBVovDAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA For sale Three bathroom light fixturesThe bar sort that many people have above their bathroom vanities These have beveled mirror fronts with chrome accents They could be a very contempory look or in another setting they would appear quite elegant Two are long each and one is long Take all three for Julie Young Stanford Drew Yahoo Groups Sponsor Buy Stock for No Minimums FREE Money BgmYkBVovDAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA Hi YobanaWelcome to our little corner of the world Youll love living here were quite an eclectic bunch and pertnear everyone is quite friendly The area has much to offer too in the way of restaurants shopping entertainment and even recreation if you happen to favor biking along scenic bayous on notsowellmaintained paths Its cool youve already signed on to our website Itll keep you up to date on goingon You learn a lot about the people who live here too Be sure to introduce yourself when youre out and about and come to our meetings the third Tuesday of each month Julie Young Stanford Drew Yahoo Groups Sponsor FREE COLLEGE MONEY CLICK HERE to search scholarships iZpOCmCAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

Re EMCA place for rentMartha give me a name and phone number of email and Ill put this in the newsletter Julie Young Original Message From Martha Brousseau To Sent Monday March AM Subject EMCA place for rent A friend is looking for a place to rent Looking for a place around a month Needs to be able to have a dog This would be a very responsible person she would be a great tenant Even if you know of something more than please pass it along Thanks Martha To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA Linoleum for saleI have a x sheet of genuine Linoleum just like they used to use in the s and s in homes and office buildings It is a buffyellow color with grey swirls Its brand new and left over from when they did my new kitchen floor they mismeasured and ordered too much Linoleum is a allnatural product made with linseed oil and cork and thats about it It wears like iron is easy on the feet and has a cool retro look I believe Linoleum installs just like conventional vinyl flooring The only trick is if you have to seam two pieces together in which case you need a special heat seal tool and lots of expertise But if you have a small bathroom or very small kitchen this one sheet should do nicely I paid nearly to have my small kitchen refloored in this linoleum You can have this piece for a mere Julie Young Stanford Drew Yahoo Groups Sponsor FREE COLLEGE MONEY CLICK HERE to search scholarships iZpOCmCAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA Personal to Joe WhiteYIKES Joe I was just perusing old emails trying to find a letter from a friend in France and uh whoops I just came across the note from you to please announce in the newsletter your direction of the production of The Mikado Uhoh Im so sorry The newsletter would have been good exposure for you I cant believe I missed it I usually try to read the EMCA emails several times so I dont leave anything out Well I goofed So sorry Now that the event is over how about if you write a synopsis of how things went and Ill make SURE that it gets printed in the next newsletter Julie Young Stanford Drew Yahoo Groups Sponsor Buy Stock for No Minimums FREE Money BgmYkBVovDAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA Who are our reps in Congress and the SenateCan someone please tell me who are our State and National representatives and if possible their addresses including email addresses I want to contact the national folks to tell them to vote for or against some of the stuff thats going on lately in the government Julie Young Stanford Drew

EMCA To EMCA new officers Martha Pat William VB Jamie EvansHi guys Im working on the February newsletter and would like to include a tiny biography about our new officers About you and about your ties to the neighborhood or anything else you would like to include and which space permits For instance what you do for a living who you live with kids what street you live on when you moved here why you choose this hood pets hobbies etc Doint worry we wont be too revealingThere will probably be only a sentence or two per person But we think it will make people feel more like they are acquainted with the officers if we can print a little bit about them Please erase the EMCA address in the To box and send your response directly to me at AND or call and leave it on my machine or drop it in my mailslot at Stanford at Drew Thanks Julie Young

EMCA EMCA newsletter time If anyone has something to be printed in the newsletter please send it NOW This address is frequently on the fritz so please also send it to Or phone me PS to WilliamIt appears I do NOT have the yardofthemonth notice Can you resend it I know which house but I want to be sure I spell names correctly etc Julie Young Stanford Drew Yahoo Groups Sponsor FREE COLLEGE MONEY CLICK HERE to search scholarships PvpGDmCAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

Re EMCA Lawn MowedIn addition to mowing lawns Jim Rolewicz is a landscaper Hes worked for several people I know including one EMCA resident In addition as his customers occasionally ask if he can do other tasks for them he has learned more skills and is now the only handyman whose name I give out to my wallpaper customers I always describe him this way A great guy about something who theres a little too much oftoo cheerful too loud too vivacious to enthusiastic Lives in the Heights Home Pager Julie Young the Wallpaper Lady Stanford Drew Original Message From mailto To mailto Sent Wednesday September PM Subject RE EMCA Lawn Mowed Im in search of someone to mow my lawn My lawnmower bit the dust and I really dont have time in the first place Any connections Thanks Laura Bomar To unsubscribe from this group send an email to mailto Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of Service infoterms Yahoo Groups Sponsor ADVERTISEMENT usyimgcomadidietsmartitapeblugif usyimgcomadidietsmartjpg usyimgcomadidietsmartdarkbluegif Start here usyimgcomadidietsmartcleargif Height ft in usyimgcomadidietsmartcleargif Weight lbs kg usyimgcomadidietsmartcleargif usyimgcomadidietsmartgif lMDegroupmailSHMArand To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to the Yahoo Terms of Service infoterms

Re EMCA Neglected vacant lots bumsDo you wanna know what the cops said one time when we called them to report people who had broken into a nice empty home and who were living there while also stealing all the personal belongings left by the former residents in addition to ripping off the fireplace mantle and any other saleable items After refusing to go inside the building to get the bums the cop said Homeless people need a place to sleep too Original Message From Gayle Rodgers Rodgers Ramsey Inc To Sent Tuesday September AM Subject Re EMCA Neglected vacant lots Great Scott This is definitely worth making an issue of I plan to print it out and send it to both Sgt Vollert and take it to a meeting with the Captain of our district October Could provide me with the dates of the specific incident with the men Please send directly to my email at or call me at Gayle Ramsey wrote I had a similar experience but I was hoping it was isolated I sent email complaints four times and received no reply I went down and filled out written complaints twice On my third trip the clueless officer checked and there was no record of any complaint Finally six weeks after my initial complaint I got some response Interestingly although HPD has made a big deal out of its claim that it will enforce code violations now the officer told me that most of the things I was complaining about were code violations that he could not do anything about I am utterly disgusted with HPDs responsiveness in our neighborhood I never see cars patrolling They tell us to call about suspicious persons etc but then they seem annoyed when we do We called at am one morning because there were two men in the new constuction next to us The officers responded and we stayed on the phone with dispatch so we could direct the officers to where the men were in the structure They rousted one of the an LET HIM GO Although we told them where the other one was they never even went to look for him Twenty minutes later the first one was back A few days later there were two more men on the lot one of them chasing the other and beating him with a pipe We called while this was in progress and HPD showed up minutes later Finally I have had so much stuff stolen from my porch and yard lately that I have started putting things I dont want out there knowing that someone will take them Thanks for letting me vent To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms Yahoo Groups Sponsor FREE COLLEGE MONEY CLICK HERE to search scholarships ujOgTCmCAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

Re EMCA Neglected vacant lots Heres my beefIts not about neighborhood issues but Hilarys complaint reminded me of my own which is now two years old The police did absolutely NOTHING about a road rage incident where a big beefy guy came out of his car during a totally nonmoving traffic jam and HIT ME Im a little bitty female then STOLE THE KEYS out of my ignition and THREW THEM OVER THE EMBANKMENT into the night then continued to THREATEN AND HARRASS me for about more minutes until we started moving again We had witnesses license number vehicle ID etc I reported it at the substation Nothing I followed up with HPD over a period of weeks Nothing Even went downtown to their office Nothing Annise Parker even got pissed off over the story and tried to use her influence with the cops NOTHING To Serve and Protect Yeah Sure Original Message From Ed Gonzales To Sent Saturday September PM Subject Re EMCA Neglected vacant lots Hilary Im sorry that you had that experience w the HPD storefront The guy in charge of the storefront is Sgt Vollert Call the storefront again during the weekday and ask for him or Officer Sobota They now have the ability to write citations on neighborhood issues like vacant lots Also when you talk w Sgt Vollert give him the times you called before and hell find the officer that gave you the poor response If anything send me the addresses of the vacant lots and Ill take it personally to Sgt Vollert since Im there every week about something And this is one of those things the publics us perception of how they HPD is perceived in fulfilling their community outreach role by having a location in the neighborhood Sometimes it doesnt click and the Sgt and I want to know why At this Tuesday nights Neartown meeting pm Cherryhurst Park Community Center HPD senior officers will be there to give a preliminary report on the enhanced police presence and foot patrols project in our area Your opportunity again to describe the response you received and anything else Thanks Ed Gonzales Neartown Association president Neartown CDC chairman pg fax Vnet Morse Houston Tx Original Message From Hilary Smith To Sent Saturday September PM Subject Re EMCA Neglected vacant lots I tried the email address at the Neartown site and it didnt work Ive called over their twice and each time I reached some spaced out guy not the same one who didnt know what I was talking about I think the storefronts are just an expensive public relations gimmick At AM EDT you wrote Hillary You can call the Rat on a Rat number under the city listings in the phone book In addition you can make an online complaint at the storefront You can access the storefront site through the Neartown site To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms Hilary Smith Bomar St Houston TX Fax Website hilary To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms To unsubscribe from this group Re EMCA Weed eaterHey strange While I was biking home from the Thanksgiving Day Parade downtown I came across a gasolinepowered weed eater or something like that dead in the middle of the street in front of some townhomes on Dennis down around Bagby or Helena I picked it up and moved into the courtyard of the townhomes which for some reason had left their driveway gate open I hope I got it back to the right homeowner but in case someones missing one you might check with that set of townhomes Incidentaly about a year ago I came up missing a small electric BlackDecker hedge trimmer I have no idea how it was taken because I NEVER turn my back on tools while Im out working But anyway its gone If anyone has come across it I sure would like to have it back Julie Young Original Message From Bob Novotny To Sent Wednesday December AM Subject Re EMCA Weed eater I woke tues morning and did my usual walk around my property Texas Junk Co and the boarded up property across the street at Welch well i found a weed eater hidden in the cactus garden waiting for a pickup at a moe opportune time If someone out there lost one give me a call and discribe it and its yours Bob GET INTERNET ACCESS FROM JUNO Juno offers FREE or PREMIUM Internet access for less Join Juno today For your FREE software visit getweb To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms Yahoo Groups Sponsor Promise to Quit Nicotrol will help vNtDAqSDAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA Free to good homeHi Guys I have a beautiful weeping ficus that has grown way too large for my place These are generally house plants but I have kept it out in the shade in the yard and it has veritably thrived on neglect It put two roots out of its pot down into the ground during the summer and these were cut when I brought the plant in during this cold snap I dont know if this has hurt it or not At any rate it will need a larger pot If anyone wants it he can have it But Since I love this plant so much I may retain rights to recall it just in case I ever win the lottery and expand into a larger abode I also have a gallon long aquarium and stand I have offered this to someone already but if he decides he doesnt want it I will be glad to give it to anyone who wants it Please let me know I will happily deliver either item Julie Young Stanford Drew To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

Re EMCA the rood againWhen my new house was having its settling in pains and I got a leak in the roof I used a guy named Gum Garcia He did a great job for me and for several friends He was also interviewed by the Chronicle one year when they did an article on Hot summertime Jobs in Houston In the Heights or try the phone book PS He even put a shingle on my birdhouse Doncha love a guy with a sense of humor Julie Young Original Message From Martha Brousseau To Sent Monday January AM Subject EMCA the rood again Hey everyone I know I asked about recommendations for a roofer a while back Hoping you will once again dig deep into the recesses of your brilliant minds and give us a name Thanks Martha To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms Yahoo Groups Sponsor Tiny Wireless Camera under Order Now FREE VCR Commander Click Here Only Day Left WoOlbBPDAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

EMCA Thanks to Ben Hilary and etcHey guys If you read the January EMCA newsletter you prolly noticed that there were stories that were amazingly similar to what has been buzzing around on our emailinternet site Well I often go to our egroup for information that can be printed in the newsletter but this month your stories practically were the entire newsletter I hope you dont mind that I took this information and wrote it in the newsletter Actually for me the newsletter editor it was a goldmine because those are exactly the types of things that make our newsletter newsy and personal I have been wanting restaurant and business reviews Cheryl has been a big help and Ive been meaning to get down to the new little antique store so I could write about it but havent made it during business hours Your information made it possible to let the neighborhood know about these places Thanks guys Julie Young

EMCA Found Cassette casealong with a few bedraggled tapes It was in the gutter on Willard near Taft Contact Julie Young at or AND Hilary I dont think its yours because not a one of the tapes was of classical music In fact I couldnt even tell you what type of music any of them are

EMCA Call for newsletter articlesHey everybody Its about that time again If theres anything anyone would like to see in the EMCA newsletter for February please email it to me at BOTH and I have constant glitches with the computer if you send it to BOTH chances are Ill get at least one or drop it in my mail slot at Stanford at Drew We are always looking for neighborly news births graduations restaurant reviews neighbor profiles as well as info on new businesses crime new construction a nice paint job etc Good and bad its all newsworthy Also please let me know if you do or do not want you name printed along with the information Some people prefer anonymity some want credit for their input And please note All articles get edited for length and other considerations but I try to keep the general gist of the article as it was submitted Also this is the perfect time to submit an ad Its only each month and reaches nearly households in the direct neighborhood It can be your business card or I can write up something to order You could even print a late Valentine for your sweetie for all the hood to see Lost pet ads run for free Julie Young editor Stanford at Drew Yahoo Groups Sponsor Get your FREE credit report with a FREE CreditCheck Monitoring Service trial ACHqaBbQCAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms

Re EMCA VH Clark GableThe owner is Jack Blalock who owned BackSttreet Caf plus some other places I think Jack died suddenly recently heart attack as I remember He wss only about or so The scoop on Clark Gable is ss I recall that he was here for aprt of a summer while taking dancing lessons at that house where he lodged as well Hr wss only here a short whiler but locals sre so proud of that fact that they have called the charming stucco threestory tworoomsoneachfloor building the Clark Gsable House ever since The gardens surrounding the compound are lovely You cant see much from the street but just the house is worth taking a walk down to see it And after all itis a bit of local lore Julie Young Stanford Drew sorry about the typing Ive a torn tendon on my left pinkie Original Message From Ed Gonzales To Sent Wednesday February PM Subject Re EMCA VH Movie Set The corner of Whitney Hyde Park currently ownedoccupieds by the recently deceased owner of BackStreet Cafe Forgot his name Ed G Original Message From Carmen Druke To Sent Wednesday February PM Subject RE EMCA VH Movie Set Ben The famous actor that lived nearby is Clark Gable who lived in a stucco house just south of Fairview in Avondale Civic Assoc Carmen Original Message From benjamin SMTP Sent Wednesday February PM To Subject Re EMCA VH Movie Set File ATThtm To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms Yahoo Groups Sponsor Get your FREE credit report with a FREE CreditCheck Monitoring Service trial ACHqaBbQCAAySSFAANoOolBTM To unsubscribe from this group send an email to Your use of Yahoo Groups is subject to infoterms
